description: Creates a share request for a custom framework in Audit Manager. The share request specifies a recipient and notifies them that a custom framework is available. Recipients have 120 days to accept or decline the request. If no action is taken, the share request expires. When you create a share request, Audit Manager stores a snapshot of your custom framework in the US East (N. Virginia) Amazon Web Services Region. Audit Manager also stores a backup of the same snapshot in the US West (Oregon) Amazon Web Services Region. Audit Manager deletes the snapshot and the backup snapshot when one of the following events occurs: When a sender resends a share request, the snapshot is replaced with an updated version that corresponds with the latest version of the custom framework. When a recipient accepts a share request, the snapshot is replicated into their Amazon Web Services account under the Amazon Web Services Region that was specified in the share request.

parameters.name: frameworkId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the custom framework to be shared.

parameters.name: destinationAccount
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account of the recipient.

parameters.name: destinationRegion
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services Region of the recipient.

nested_items.name: assessmentFrameworkShareRequest
nested_items.description: The share request that's created by the StartAssessmentFrameworkShare API.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the share request.

nested_items.name: frameworkId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the shared custom framework.

nested_items.name: frameworkName
nested_items.description: The name of the custom framework that the share request is for.

nested_items.name: frameworkDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the shared custom framework.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the share request.

nested_items.name: sourceAccount
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account of the sender.

nested_items.name: destinationAccount
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account of the recipient.

nested_items.name: destinationRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region of the recipient.

nested_items.name: expirationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the share request expires.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the share request was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdated
nested_items.description: Specifies when the share request was last updated.

nested_items.name: comment
nested_items.description: An optional comment from the sender about the share request.

nested_items.name: standardControlsCount
nested_items.description: The number of standard controls that are part of the shared custom framework.

nested_items.name: customControlsCount
nested_items.description: The number of custom controls that are part of the shared custom framework.

nested_items.name: complianceType
nested_items.description: The compliance type that the shared custom framework supports, such as CIS or HIPAA.
